Number.spell_desc:
Adds a number to the stack
			
Each line is equal to one number.
			
Ex: --- is equal to 3, ----- is equal to 5

Add.spell_desc: Removes two elements from the stack and adds the sum to the queue.

Subtract.spell_desc: Removes two elements from the stack and adds the difference to the queue.

Multiply.spell_desc: Removes two elements from the stack and adds the product to the queue.

Arcane Raycast.spell_desc:
Shoots a raycast from the center of the entity's camera.
			
Returns the first entity or position of the raycast's collision.

Entity Position.spell_desc: Returns the position of the entity inputted.

Entity Direction.spell_desc: Returns the direction of the entity inputted.

Flip.spell_desc: Flips the position of the top two elements in the stack

Pop.spell_desc: Pops the first element in the stack

Summon Light.spell_desc: Summon a glowing, arcane light at the given position.

Summon Block.spell_desc: Summon an arcane block at the given position.
